ygData.subject: Re: Decepticon Leadership
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron lands on the ground, and stands tall. No Autofire, I must handle this myself. He turns to Motormaster, So you are in charge Motormaster, you would

Subject: Re: Decepticon Leadership
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron lands on the ground, and stands tall. "No Autofire, I must handle
this myself." He turns to Motormaster, "So you are in charge Motormaster,
you would have made a fine leader, but I am here to take it back." He said
confidently.

Motormaster sneered, "If you are the real Megatron I would gladly follow
you, but you are not". There is a long silence, with a long stare down
between the two warriors, then Motormaster breaks the silence. "There is
only one way to prove you are the real deal" he says. "A one on one fight,
only Megatron would be able to beat me in a fist fight". Megatron smiles a
evil smile, and takes off his arm cannon, "Very well Motormaster" he
finishes, his hand retracting in his arm joint, and a purple energon mace
replacing it. Motormaster pulls out his physical blade, and readies it.
Then there is silence again, the calm before the storm.
